TopicTitle: EVA velocity reading or gauge but most likely a thing.

Articles.Content: I was wondering if it there was a mod that gave you EVA velocity reading?

The one I know for sure works (because I use it) is NavHud. It gives you a couple readouts, one of which is your velocity. You can't change the mode though so it may be in target, surface, or orbit mode and you just have to live with what it gives you.
[VOID](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/54533) gives you a HUD; so does [Kerbal Engineer](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/18230) (but you have to enable it)
